sentences.en: ‘D'yeh want a celery choc ice?’ ‘Very funny, I don't think.’.
sentences.cn: “你要来一个芹菜巧克力冰淇淋吗？”“太好笑了，我不要。”。

sentences.en: "You're a funny feller," Fairbairn said grumpily.
sentences.cn: “你是个不可理喻的家伙。”费尔贝恩气冲冲地说。

sentences.en: (= don’t laugh ) , Paul; poor Teresa was nearly in tears.
sentences.cn: 没什么好笑的，保罗，可怜的特雷莎都快哭了。

sentences.en: A lot of the play is very funny.
sentences.cn: 这出剧有许多地方都非常有趣。

sentences.en: For some unaccountable reason, it struck me as extremely funny.
sentences.cn: 不知道为什么，我觉得这极其滑稽。

sentences.en: He burst into a high-pitched laugh, as though he'd said something funny.
sentences.cn: 他突然放声大笑，好像讲了什么好笑的事似的。

sentences.en: He gets funny turns, you know. It's his age.
sentences.cn: 他总是感觉不舒服。也是，他都这个岁数了。

sentences.en: He is such a personality— he is so funny.
sentences.cn: 他很有个性魅力——非常风趣。

sentences.en: His laughter stopped her mid-sentence. ‘ What’s so funny? ’ she demanded.
sentences.cn: 他的笑声打断了她的话。“有什么好笑的？”她厉声问道。

sentences.en: I had a funny feeling in the pit of my stomach.
sentences.cn: 我心头有种怪怪的感觉。

sentences.en: I suppose you think you're funny.
sentences.cn: 我想你认为自己很好笑。

sentences.en: I'm not being funny but I haven't got all day.
sentences.cn: 我不是开玩笑，但我没有整天的时间。

sentences.en: If this is your idea of a joke, I don’t find it at all funny .
sentences.cn: 如果你觉得这是个玩笑，那我认为它一点也不好笑。

sentences.en: In a misguided attempt to be funny, he manages only offensiveness.
sentences.cn: 他本想表现得风趣一点，却弄巧成拙地冒犯了别人。

sentences.en: It's a play — painful, funny and powerfully acted.
sentences.cn: 这是一部悲喜交加、表演感人的戏剧。

sentences.en: It's funny how you remember things.
sentences.cn: 你回忆往事的方式真好笑。

sentences.en: It’s not funny (= don’t laugh ) , Paul; poor Teresa was nearly in tears.
sentences.cn: 没什么好笑的，保罗，可怜的特雷莎都快哭了。

sentences.en: Luckily, when I explained the situation, he saw the funny side (= recognized that it was partly funny ) .
sentences.cn: 好在我把情况解释了以后，他看到了好笑的一面。

sentences.en: My head had begun to ache and my stomach felt funny.
sentences.cn: 我的头开始疼起来，胃也有些不舒服。

sentences.en: the funniest man in Britain
sentences.cn: 英国最滑稽的男人

sentences.en: The story was really funny— it tickled me.
sentences.cn: 那个故事真有趣——笑死我了。

sentences.en: This collection of letters is affectionate, candid and wickedly funny.
sentences.cn: 这本书信集感情真挚，语言坦率，还透着一种顽皮的滑稽。

sentences.en: What’s that funny smell?
sentences.cn: 那是什么怪味？

sentences.en: You know these funny cigarettes I smoke?
sentences.cn: 你了解我抽的这些味道怪异的香烟么？

words.tran_cn: 乐趣；玩笑；有趣的人或事

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)［反话，用于表示不欣赏听到的笑话或趣事］喔，真好笑！
n. 不道德的行为；不规矩的事
(非正式)［用于陈述或建议前，表示尽管该陈述或建议可能看似俏皮或奇怪但却是当真的］我不是在开玩笑，但——

trans.tran_cn: 有趣的，古怪的，非法的，略感不适的，不正常的
滑稽人物；笑话，有趣的故事；滑稽连环漫画栏；（英）（比赛用）单人双桨小艇
